message: I guess he must've rethought the whole banquet thing, because this time, the table is set with a rather conservative menu of toast and salad.

name: クリア
message: "Oh, Master!"
Clear is standing behind the bar, neither nude nor wearing an apron this time.

name: クリア
message: "I'll get you a drink. Please have a seat, Master."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Thanks."
I take a seat on the couch and watch him as he works.
...Even after showing me his face yesterday, he's still wearing his mask.
I guess he just needs more time. I mean, it took a lot of courage for him to show his face that once.

name: クリア
message: "Sorry for the wait."
A minute later, Clear walks over carrying two glasses of milk.
He sets them on the table and takes a seat next to me.

name: クリア
message: "Here you go, Master."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thanks for all this."
I clap my hands together in front of my face, then spread butter over a slice of toast and put it in my mouth.
It's perfectly toasted.

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's good."

name: クリア
message: "I'm so glad to hear that."
Clear bobs his head happily, but doesn't say another word after that.
He's been acting really weird today. All because he showed me his face?
I take another look at Clear once I've finished eating.
He's looking down, twiddling his thumbs.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear, so, um..."

name: クリア
message: "Yes?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh, uh, well... sorry about yesterday."

name: クリア
message: "Why are you sorry?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, like, you said we should run away, right? If I'd just listened, you wouldn't have gotten hurt."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So I wanted to apologize."

name: クリア
message: "But I'm fine. Please don't apologize."

name: クリア
message: "I'm just glad you weren't hurt, Master."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear..."
Something is just kinda... off about him. He seems so... innocent.
It occurred to me yesterday, when he showed me his real face, that he's always doing his best to show me how hard he's trying.
His real face...
...Maybe I should just get it over with.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Can I ask you something?"

name: クリア
message: "Sure."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You really don't like showing your face, huh?"

name: クリア
message: "Uh!"
Clear starts to fidget even more.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm not gonna force you... but I'd like to see your face again. Do you mind?"
A long silence passes before Clear speaks.

name: クリア
message: "...Alright, I'll show you."
He nods hard, like he's trying to psych himself up, before grabbing his mask with both hands.

name: クリア
message: "Ta-da!"
That Noh mask again.
If he'd pulled this gag again before showing me his real face, I'd have called him on it without hesitation...
...But I just can't do it now.

name: クリア
message: "Master?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh, no... Sorry. It's okay."

name: クリア
message: "Oh, um, no, uh! I didn't mean it like that, Master!"
He must've sensed my disappointment. He starts flailing his arms.

name: クリア
message: "I'm sorry... That was just a joke. Though it really does take a lot of courage to take it off."
Clear places his hands on his knees.

name: クリア
message: "I trust you, Master, and what you told me yesterday made me truly happy."

name: クリア
message: "But I have to admit that I'm still a little afraid... I spent so long convinced that I should never show my face."

name: クリア
message: "But I'll show it to you. So please, look. Look at me. ...Please."
Clear reaches for the second mask.
